name: TorTab - The Torbrowser
short_description: The Torbutton is history. The TorTab now plugs into the Browser. Dooble Web Browser, a secure open source userfriendly Tool to explore the web secure over Tor. Steer Tor in the TorTab browser with Vidalia.
summary: TorTab is the new Torbrowser based on Vidalia and Dooble Web Browser
